sqlMap.select: SELECT , NULL AS `group`, NULL AS group_name FROM discussion d WHERE d.hash = #hash# AND d.interHash = #interHash# AND d.user_name = #userName# AND d.rating IS NULL
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO discussion (discussion_id, interHash, hash, type, user_name, text, date, parent_hash) VALUES (#comment.id#, #interHash#, #comment.hash#, #discussionItemType.id#, #userName#, #comment.text#, #comment.date#, #comment.parentHash#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE discussion SET text = #comment.text#, hash = #comment.hash#, change_date = #comment.changeDate# WHERE user_name = #userName# AND interHash = #interHash# AND hash = #hash#
